turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, how are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Great! How are you? How is your weekend going?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Not too bad. I'm excited to be volunteering my time to raise money for a children's charity. It's called Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: that's great that you volunteer. what kind of activities do you do for the children?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Mostly what I do is try and encourage people to donate what they can to the cause. Save the Children has been around since 1919!  The funds are used to promote children's rights, better their education and health care and also provide emergency aid in situations of natural disaster.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: do you know what countries they primarily donate to?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Actually, there a huge number of countries that are helped by Save the Children. It's an international organization. Some of the countries include the U.S., Uganda, Kenya, Peru, and Cambodia.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: that is great. i heavily support organizations that help our own united states.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Did you know that, even one year after the destruction caused by hurricane Harvey, Save the Children is still present in Texas helping children to fully recover? It's truly a blessing what they do. Money also goes to provide shelter.  Just 77 cents a day can provide shelter for a refugee family. Do you think Save the Children is a cause that you would consider donating to?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: wow I'm heappy to hear that. It's wild the devastation that hurricanes do.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: In 2017, 155 million children were helped. There's always more to do though. How would you feel about helping Save the Children by donating some or all of your payment from this task?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i would be willing to donate 10 cents. My charitable donations budget is small because I do a great deal of donating to animal organizations. I love the italian greyhound rescue.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Even 10 cents is helpful. Thank you! That's great that you donate to animal charities. I support PAWS Chicago too.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: the snamils need our help just as much as the children do.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No doubt! I just heard about a country does not kill rescue animals in shelters. So every shelter they run is a no-kill shelter. Have you heard that?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i didn't know about that. great to hear it! hopefully more will do the same. I have a 5k to run tomorrow for the italian greyhounds. all proceeds go to the animals.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Good for you! Wow, that's great!  It's nice when volunteers can act in other ways in addition to giving money. Especially since not everyone has the money to give.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: right. I like to donate my time in addition to money. charitable giving is a good thing to do.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well thank you for offering 10 cents from this task to Save the Children. I will look into your charity as well and see what I can do to help. It's been nice talking with you. Have a great weekend and good luck with the run tomorrow!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: great, thanks. have a nice sunday!
